welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Waddinxveen, a charming city known for its beautiful canals and quaint windmills. Get ready to experience the unique blend of old-world charm and modern amenities. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Handles domestic and European flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Handles international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Handles intercontinental flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Soesterberg Air Base Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
